verses.1: “Note nungta-in tampi na phak theih nading uh le na pu na pate uh tungah piak dinga Topa a kiciam sa leitang ah va pai-in na neih theih nadingun tu ni-a note kiangah kong gen thupiakna khempeuh limtakin na zuih ding uh na ngaihsun ding uh hi.
verses.2: A thupiakte na zui uh hiam, na zui kei uh hiam cih a theih nadingin note hong niamkhiatin, na lungsim uh ah bang om hiam cih a theih nadingin Topa na Pasian un sehnel gamah hih kum sawm li sung note hong paipihna lampi khempeuh na ciamteh ding uh hi.
verses.3: Mite, an bek tawh nungta loin Topaʼ kam sung panin a pusuak thu khempeuh tawh nungta hi, ci-in note hong theihsak nadingin, amah in note hong niamkhiatin hong gilkialsak a, note hitaleh na pu na pate uh hitaleh a theih ngei loh manna tawh hong vak hi.
verses.4: Hih kum sawm li sung noteʼ tunga om na puan uh sia loin, na khe uh zong bawk lo hi.
verses.5: Tua ahih manin mi khat in a tapa a khal bangin Topa na Pasian un note hong khalna thu na lungsim uh ah thei un.
verses.6: Tua ahih ciangin ama lampi zuihna le amah zahtakna tawh Topa note Pasianʼ thupiakte na zui ding uh hi.
verses.7: Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa noteʼ Pasian in, mual le guam ah a luang tuite a omna, ciktui le tuikhuk a omna leitang,
verses.8: mangbuh le mangbuhham, leenggui le theikung le mang kawlsing a omna leitang, oliv kungte le khuaizu a omna leitang,
verses.9: bangmah kisam loin, cil bawl loin an na nek nading uh leitang, a suangte sik ahihna leitang, mualte sung panin sumsan na tawh theihna uh leitang ahi gam hoih ah note hong paipih hi.
verses.10: Note in ne-in na gil uh vah dinga, note tungah gam hoih hong piakna hangin Topa na Pasian uh na phat ding uh hi.
verses.11: “Tu ni-a no tungah kong gen ahi ama thupiaknate le a ngeina kipte le a thukhamte zuih lohna tawh Topa na Pasian uh mangngilh kha ding na hih manun kidawm un.
verses.12: Tua hikeileh, an ne-in na kham uh ciang, inn hoihte lamin tuate sungah na ten uh ciang,
verses.13: na bawnghonte uh le na tuuhonte uh tampi a phak ciang le na khamte uh le na ngunte uh tampi pha-in, na neih khempeuh uh tampi a phak ciangin
verses.14: na lungsim uh lianin, salsuahna Egypt gam panin note a hong paikhiatpih,
verses.15: a lian a lauhuai sehnel gamah gul gu nei le momai lak le tui om lohna lei keu ah a hong paipih pa, meisuang tawh a kibang suangpi panin tui a hong pia pa,
verses.16: a tawpna ah a hoihin na gamtat theih nading uh a deihna-in note hong niamkhiatin a hong ze-et theih nadingin na pu na pate un a theih loh manna tawh sehnel gamah a hong vak Topa na Pasian uh na mangngilh kha ding uh hi.
verses.17: Na lungsim uh ah, ‘Ka vangliatna uh le ka thahatna un hih hauhna hong ngahsak hi,’ ci kha ding na hih manun kingaihsun un.
verses.18: Tu ni-a mah bangin na pu na pate uh tungah a kiciamna a kipsak theih nadingin, na hauh nadingun vangliatna a hong pia pa amah ahih manin Topa na Pasian uh na phawk ding uh hi.
verses.19: Topa na Pasian uh mangngilhin pasian dangteʼ nung zui-in tuateʼ na semin na biak uh leh, na sia taktak ding uh hi, ci-in tu ni-in limtakin kong hilh khol hi.
verses.20: Topa noteʼ Pasianʼ aw ngai lo ahih manun, Topa in noteʼ mai ah a siatsak minamte bangin note na sia ding uh hi.
